thread.title: Ground News - Numerous crashes reported amid winter storm warning as more than 6 inches of snow expected in McHenry County
thread.title_full: Ground News - Numerous crashes reported amid winter storm warning as more than 6 inches of snow expected in McHenry County

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Numerous crashes reported amid winter storm warning as more than 6 inches of snow expected in McHenry County
text:
Summary by Ground News Several inches of snow is expected throughout McHenry County and Lake County on Friday. Dozens of crashes, including one where a car drove into a creek, have been reported across Lake and McHenry counties. The National Weather Service issued a winter weather advisory Thursday for Lake, McHenry, Winnebago and Boone counties. Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
Lake and McHenry County Scanner Numerous crashes reported amid winter storm warning as more than 6 inches of snow expected in McHenry County Snow was seen falling at Route 176 and River Road in Island Lake, causing slick road conditions, as several inches of snow is expected throughout McHenry County and Lake County on Friday. | Photo: Lake County Passage Dozens of crashes, including one where a car drove into a creek, have been reported across Lake and McHenry counties Friday morning as winter storm warnings and advisories remain in effect. The National Weather Service (NWS) issued …
